author: bandaram
msg: Update derbyall test suite to include derbynetclientmats suite.

author: rich
msg: This is a patch from Carlin Rogers to address http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-577 : add beehive- prefix to url-template-config file and clean up URLTemplatesFactory

I also added a ServletContainerAdapter to the urlTemplates test webapp.  The adapter mocks up the right secure/unsecure listen ports and claims that certain URLs are secure, so that the URL Templates tests can be run without integrating a TomcatServletContainerAdapter.
tests: bvt in netui, drt in test/webapps/urlTemplates (WinXP)

author: brett
msg: don't fail if there is a default value and the parameter is set to required.
